questionParts: For the dynamical system  \dot{x} = x - x^{4/3} ,
what are the fixed points and their stability?
options: Fixed points at  x = 0  (stable) and  x = 1  (unstable)
Fixed points at  x = 0  (unstable) and  x = 1  (stable)
Only one fixed point at  x = 0  (stable)
questions.correctAnswer: Fixed points at  x = 0  (unstable) and  x = 1  (stable)
